lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:34.431]Try not to abuse your power
[00:41.630]I know we didn't choose to change
[00:49.167]You might not wanna lose your power
[00:56.768]But havin' it's so strange
[01:01.397]
[01:02.420]She said you were a hero
[01:06.536]You played the part
[01:09.928]But you ruined her in a year
[01:13.243]Don't act like it was hard
[01:17.281]And you swear you didn't know (Didn't know)
[01:20.237]No wonder why you didn't ask
[01:24.315]She was sleepin' in your clothes (In your clothes)
[01:27.993]But now she's got to get to class
[01:30.694]
[01:31.067]How dare you?
[01:34.057]And how could you?
[01:37.965]Will you only feel bad when they find out?
[01:41.532]If you could take it all back
[01:45.864]Would you?
[01:47.559]
[01:48.226]Try not to abuse your power
[01:55.624]I know we didn't choose to change
[02:02.952]You might not wanna lose your power
[02:10.616]But havin' it's so strange
[02:15.894]
[02:16.242]I thought that I was special
[02:19.949]You made me feel
[02:23.101]Like it was my fault, you were the devil
[02:27.520]Lost your appeal
[02:30.790]Does it keep you in control? (In control)
[02:34.205]For you to keep her in a cage?
[02:38.239]And you swear you didn't know (Didn't know)
[02:41.522]You said you thought she was your age
[02:44.524]
[02:44.536]How dare you?
[02:47.969]And how could you?
[02:51.892]Will you only feel bad if it turns out
[02:55.532]That they kill your contract?
[02:59.648]Would you?
[03:01.827]
[03:01.986]Try not to abuse your power
[03:09.292]I know we didn't choose to change
[03:16.895]You might not wanna lose your power
[03:24.439]But power isn't pain
[03:28.665]
[03:33.302]Mmm
[03:39.103]Ooh
[03:46.637]La-la-la-la-la, hmm
[03:54.089]La-la-la-la-la-la, la-la
tlyric:
[00:34.431]不要滥用你的权力
[00:41.630]其实我们都未曾改变过
[00:49.167]但或许你不愿失去权力
[00:56.768]可就算拥有 却也是怪癖无端
[01:01.397]
[01:02.420]她说你在她眼中
[01:06.536]扮演着英雄的角色
[01:09.928]可短暂一年 你便将她摧残
[01:13.243]却不以为意 故作无事
[01:17.281]你佯装无知 虚伪发誓
[01:20.237]也难怪你从未问候过
[01:24.315]她曾裹着你的衣服入眠
[01:27.993]但如今她仍得去上学
[01:30.694]
[01:31.067]你怎敢如此待她
[01:34.057]你怎么能这样做呢
[01:37.965]当恶行被揭发 你仅会心神难安吗
[01:41.532]若你能将时光倒流 重新开始
[01:45.864]你又将如何做
[01:47.559]
[01:48.226]不要滥用你的权力
[01:55.624]其实我们都未曾改变过
[02:02.952]但或许你不愿失去权力
[02:10.616]可就算拥有 却也是怪癖无端
[02:15.894]
[02:16.242]我认为自己很特别
[02:19.949]可你让我自领过错
[02:23.101]你简直就是恶魔
[02:27.520]你对我 再无吸引
[02:30.790]难道将她囚禁牢笼中
[02:34.205]就能将你自己掌控吗
[02:38.239]你佯装无知 虚伪发誓
[02:41.522]她不过和你同年龄段
[02:44.524]
[02:44.536]你怎敢如此待她
[02:47.969]你怎么能这样做呢
[02:51.892]倘若他们毁坏合约
[02:55.532]你心作何感想
[02:59.648]会好受吗
[03:01.827]
[03:01.986]不要滥用你的权力
[03:09.292]其实我们都未曾改变过
[03:16.895]但或许你不愿失去权力
[03:24.439]但请别仗权 带来苦痛
